entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
